titles.title: Second Sunday in Ordinary Time Year C Psalms

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Tell among all the peoples
the wonders of the Lord.

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines:
Proclaim his salvation day by day.
Tell among the nations his glory,
and his wonders among all the peoples.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines:
Worship the LORD in holy splendour.
O treble before him, all the earth.
Say to the nations, "The LORD is king."
He will judge the peoples in fairness. (R)
